topic: Discussion on Admtc: Exploring Concepts and Applications

message.content: The context mentions "ADMTC" as an agency that acts as a service provider for educational services, representing the certifying organization at the national level for all partner centers. ADMTC is responsible for supporting partner centers in implementing training for certification, coordinating the organization of assessments, and ensuring compliance with certification rules. The platform "admtc.pro" is also highlighted as a resource for accessing necessary materials for the certification training.
message.header_ref:

topic: Understanding Certification: An Overview of Its Role and Importance

message.content: La certification mentionnée ici est la certification professionnelle « Manager du Développement Commercial » (MDC). Elle est délivrée par un organisme certificateur et atteste que le candidat a validé tous les blocs de compétences requis pour cette certification.
